edu.hm.cs.bikebattle.app.activities

Class TrackingActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.hm.cs.bikebattle.app.activities.BaseActivity
      • edu.hm.cs.bikebattle.app.activities.TrackingActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback

    public class TrackingActivity
extends BaseActivity
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
    Activity for tracking a new track.
    Author:
    Lukas Brauckmann
